title: SPACIOUS CHARMING 2BR 1BA HW DW CORNER LOT 2 CARS AVAIL 9/1
posting_body: PLEASE CALL 781-962-6615 WITH QUESTIONS OR TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING.
VIEWINGS CAN NOT BE SCHEDULED VIA EMAIL OR TEXT.
Charming spacious 2BR 1BA unit located on the first floor of a two-family home.
The unit features a spacious living room with a decorative fireplace and adjacent sunroom.
There is a formal dining room, updated kitchen, two bedrooms and a full bath.
The unit has newer vinyl replacement windows throughout.
The heat is by gas and the tenant pays for all of their own utilities.
Washer and dryer hookups are provided for the tenant's convenience in the basement as is additional storage.
Off-street parking for 2 cars including one garage space.
This unit is located close to West Newton Square, the Historic West Newton Cinema, and many other shops and eateries in the area.
Minutes from the Mass Pike and Route 128.
Close to several of the Express Buses to downtown Boston make this a commuter's dream location.
SORRY, NO PETS AND NO SMOKING.
APPLICANTS MUST HAVE GOOD CREDIT TO QUALIFY WITHOUT EXCEPTION.
Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
Photos of managed buildings may be representative only and not of the actual unit available.
